languages.text: "Я не боюсь прослыть жесток{mf|им|ой}. Лучше учинить несколько расправ, чем потворствовать беспорядку — не в этом ли заключается самое великое милосердие?"

traits.locale_text: "Я не боюсь прослыть жесток{mf|им|ой}. Лучше учинить несколько расправ, чем потворствовать беспорядку — не в этом ли заключается самое великое милосердие?"

languages.text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"
languages.original_text: "Я не боюсь прослыть жесток{mf|им|ой}. Лучше учинить несколько расправ, чем потворствовать беспорядку — не в этом ли заключается самое великое милосердие?"

traits.locale_text: "I am not afraid of getting a ruthless reputation. It is best to stage several executions than to foster a rebellion — is it not the greatest of mercies?"
"I am not afraid of getting a ruthless reputation. It is best to stage several executions than to foster a rebellion — is it not the greatest of mercies?"
"I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"
"I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"
"I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

languages.text: “我并不怕以残忍无情而闻名于世。我情愿粉碎一场叛乱，也不愿宽恕一场叛乱。到头来，这难道不是更大的仁慈吗？”
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

traits.locale_text: “我并不怕以残忍无情而闻名于世。我情愿粉碎一场叛乱，也不愿宽恕一场叛乱。到头来，这难道不是更大的仁慈吗？”

languages.text: «No me preocupa ganarme una reputación por ser despiadad{mf|o|a}. Preferiría aplastar una rebelión que permitirla. En el fondo, ¿no es esa la opción más misericordiosa?».
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

traits.locale_text: «No me preocupa ganarme una reputación por ser despiadad{mf|o|a}. Preferiría aplastar una rebelión que permitirla. En el fondo, ¿no es esa la opción más misericordiosa?».

languages.text: 「私は冷酷という評判を得ることを恐れない。反乱を容認するよりも、むしろ反乱を鎮圧するほうが、結局は大きな慈悲ではないか」
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

traits.locale_text: 「私は冷酷という評判を得ることを恐れない。反乱を容認するよりも、むしろ反乱を鎮圧するほうが、結局は大きな慈悲ではないか」

languages.text: "Ich habe keine Angst vor einem Ruf der Rücksichtslosigkeit. Ich würde einen Aufstand eher niederschlagen als dulden – denn ist das nicht letztlich die größere Gnade?"
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keine Angst vor einem Ruf der Rücksichtslosigkeit. Ich würde einen Aufstand eher niederschlagen als dulden – denn ist das nicht letztlich die größere Gnade?"

languages.text: « Je me moque bien d'être {mf|dépeint|dépeinte} comme quelqu'un d'impitoyable. Plutôt écraser une rébellion que de la cautionner. N'est-ce pas là la véritable miséricorde ? »
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

traits.locale_text: « Je me moque bien d'être {mf|dépeint|dépeinte} comme quelqu'un d'impitoyable. Plutôt écraser une rébellion que de la cautionner. N'est-ce pas là la véritable miséricorde ? »

languages.text: "İnsafsızlığımla ün salmaktan korkmuyorum. İsyanı hoş görmeyi değil, ezip bastırmayı tercih ederim. Nihayetinde asıl merhametli olan şey de bu değil midir?"
languages.original_text: "I am not afraid of acquiring a reputation for ruthlessness. I would rather crush a rebellion than condone one — is that not the greater mercy, in the end?"

traits.locale_text: "İnsafsızlığımla ün yapmaktan korkmuyorum. Bir isyanı ezip bastırmayı tercih ederim, o isyanı hoş görmeyi değil. Asıl merhametli olan şey de bu değil mi nihayetinde?"
